languages.text: "Простите, {name}, но вы уже на своем месте — месте Вольного Торговца. Я же... наследница новаторского трона. И только мне решать, какая судьба ждет Дом Орселлио".

traits.locale_text: "Простите, {name}, но вы уже на своем месте — месте Вольного Торговца. Я же... наследница новаторского трона. И только мне решать, какая судьба ждет Дом Орселлио".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "With all due respect, {name}, you already have a position of your own, that of a Rogue Trader. I am... heir to a Novator's throne. And it is for me to decide the fate that awaits House Orsellio."
languages.original_text: "Простите, {name}, но вы уже на своем месте — месте Вольного Торговца. Я же... наследница новаторского трона. И только мне решать, какая судьба ждет Дом Орселлио".

traits.locale_text: "With all due respect, {name}, you already have a position of your own — that of a Rogue Trader. I am... a heiress to a Novator's throne. And it is for me to decide the fate that awaits House Orsellio."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "With all due respect, {name}, you already have a position of your own — that of a Rogue Trader. I am... a heiress to a Novator's throne. And it is for me to decide the fate that awaits House Orsellio."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "With all due respect, {name}, you already have a position of your own, that of a Rogue Trader. I am... an heiress to a Novator's throne. And it is for me to decide the fate that awaits House Orsellio."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "With all due respect, {name}, you already have a position of your own, that of a Rogue Trader. I am... an heiress to a Novator's throne. And it is for me to decide the fate that awaits House Orsellio."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "With all due respect, {name}, you already have a position of your own, that of a Rogue Trader. I am... heir to a Novator's throne. And it is for me to decide the fate that awaits House Orsellio."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "With all due respect, {name}, you already have a position of your own, that of a Rogue Trader. I am... heir to a Novator's throne. And it is for me to decide the fate that awaits House Orsellio."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「お言葉を返すようですが、{name}様、あなたにはあなたの立場がすでにあります、自由開拓者という立場が。あたくしは…ノベイターの玉座を継ぐ者。オーセリオ家を待つ運命を決めるのが役割」
languages.original_text: "With all due respect, {name}, you already have a position of your own, that of a Rogue Trader. I am... heir to a Novator's throne. And it is for me to decide the fate that awaits House Orsellio."

traits.locale_text: 「お言葉を返すようですが、{name}様、あなたにはあなたの立場がすでにあります、自由開拓者という立場が。あたくしは…ノベイターの玉座を継ぐ者。オーセリオ家を待つ運命を決めるのが役割」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “恕我直言，{name}，你已经有了你自己的位置，那就是行商浪人的位置。至于我……我是大族长的继承人，奥赛罗家族的命运应当由我决定。”
languages.original_text: "With all due respect, {name}, you already have a position of your own, that of a Rogue Trader. I am... heir to a Novator's throne. And it is for me to decide the fate that awaits House Orsellio."

traits.locale_text: “恕我直言，{name}，你已经有了你自己的位置，那就是行商浪人的位置。至于我……我是大族长的继承人，奥塞罗家族的命运应当由我决定。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Avec tout mon respect, {name}, vous avez déjà votre place : celle de {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Moi... je suis l'héritière d'un trône de Novator. Le destin de la maison Orsellio repose entre mes mains. »
languages.original_text: "With all due respect, {name}, you already have a position of your own, that of a Rogue Trader. I am... heir to a Novator's throne. And it is for me to decide the fate that awaits House Orsellio."

traits.locale_text: « Avec tout mon respect, {name}, vous avez déjà votre place : celle de {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Moi... je suis l'héritière d'un trône de Novator. Le destin de la maison Orsellio repose entre mes mains. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Con el debido respeto, {name}, usted ya ostenta la posición de Comerciante Independiente. Yo soy... la heredera al trono de la Novator. El destino que aguarda a la casa Orsellio depende de mi decisión, no de la suya».
languages.original_text: "With all due respect, {name}, you already have a position of your own, that of a Rogue Trader. I am... heir to a Novator's throne. And it is for me to decide the fate that awaits House Orsellio."

traits.locale_text: «Con el debido respeto, {name}, usted ya ostenta la posición de Comerciante Independiente. Yo soy... la heredera al trono de la Novator. El destino que aguarda a la casa Orsellio depende de mi decisión, no de la suya».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Bei allem Respekt, {name}, Ihr habt bereits eine eigene Position, die {mf|eines Freihändlers|einer Freihändlerin}. Ich bin ... die Erbin eines Novatorenthrons. Und ich entscheide, welches Schicksal Haus Orsellio erwartet."
languages.original_text: "With all due respect, {name}, you already have a position of your own, that of a Rogue Trader. I am... heir to a Novator's throne. And it is for me to decide the fate that awaits House Orsellio."

traits.locale_text: "Bei allem Respekt, {name}, Ihr habt bereits eine eigene Position, die {mf|eines Freihändlers|einer Freihändlerin}. Ich bin ... die Erbin eines Novatorenthrons. Und ich entscheide, welches Schicksal Haus Orsellio erwartet."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Saygım sonsuz {name} ancak bir Hür Tacir olarak zaten makamının sorumluluklarıyla meşgulsün. Ben de... Rota Reisi tahtının vârisiyim. Orsellio Hanesi'ni bekleyen kadere karar vermek bana düşer."
languages.original_text: "With all due respect, {name}, you already have a position of your own, that of a Rogue Trader. I am... heir to a Novator's throne. And it is for me to decide the fate that awaits House Orsellio."

traits.locale_text: "Saygım sonsuz {name} ancak bir Hür Tacir olarak zaten kendi sorumluluklarına sahipsin. Ben de... Rota Reisi tahtının vârisiyim. Orsellio Hanesi'ni bekleyen kader için karar almak da bana düşer."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
